Module Node¶

class node.Node(parent, lead_state, acc_state, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param, simulation_param)[source]¶

Bases: object

property acc_state¶
Return type

State

add_acc_state(acc_state, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param, simulation_param)[source]¶

Update/Add ACC state

Parameters

  • acc_state (State) – ACC state with acceleration, velocity, x/y-position, orientation, steering vel.

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of leading vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of ACC vehicle

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with simulation parameters

Return type

float

Return type
